```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(gtsummary)
library(tableone)
```

```{r}
data_wide <- read_csv("../outputs/data_wide_mm.csv")
data_long <- read_csv("../outputs/asthma_inflammation_set.csv")
```

```{r}
write.csv(print(
  CreateTableOne(
    data = data_long %>% mutate(eventname = factor(eventname, c("baseline_year_1_arm_1", "1_year_follow_up_y_arm_1", "2_year_follow_up_y_arm_1"))),
    vars = c("asthma_diagnosis_l", "asthma_attack_l", "asthma_composite", "recent_active_asthma"),
    strata = "eventname",
    factorVars = c("asthma_diagnosis_l", "asthma_attack_l", "asthma_composite", "recent_active_asthma"),
    includeNA = T
  ),
  missing = T
),
"../outputs/table1_asthma_080222.csv")
```

```{r}
table1_vars <- data_wide %>%
  dplyr::select(
    age_2y_years,
    sex_br,
    race_black,
    race_white,
    race_asian,
    ethnicity_hisp,
    household_income,
    parents_avg_edu,
    devhx_3_p,
    reshist_addr1_adi_perc,
    reshist_addr1_popdensity,
    reshist_addr1_no2,
    reshist_addr1_pm25,
    reshist_addr1_proxrd,
    asthma_attack_l_ever,
    asthma_composite_ever,
    SA_y_ever,
    SI_y_ever,
    Montelukast_2w_ever,
    Immune_modulators_2w_ever,
    Systemic_steroids_class_H02_2w_ever,
    Topical_steroids_2w_ever,
    asthma_PRS,
    CBCL_mean,
    BPM_mean) %>% names()

table1_vars_factors <- table1_vars[!table1_vars %in% c("age_2y_years", "asthma_PRS",
                                                       "reshist_addr1_adi_perc",
                                                       "reshist_addr1_popdensity",
                                                       "reshist_addr1_no2",
                                                       "reshist_addr1_pm25",
                                                       "reshist_addr1_proxrd",
                                                       "household_income",
                                                       "parents_avg_edu",
                                                       "devhx_3_p",
                                                       "CBCL_mean",
                                                       "BPM_mean")]

write.csv(print(
  CreateTableOne(
    data = data_wide,
    vars = table1_vars,
    strata = "asthma_diagnosis_l_ever",
    factorVars = table1_vars_factors,
    includeNA = T,
    addOverall = T
  ),
    missing = T,
  pDigits = 5
),
"../outputs/table1_main_values_080222.csv")

# Get FDR adjusted p-values  
p_values <- readxl::read_excel("../outputs/table1_main_values_080222.xlsx", sheet = 2) %>%
  mutate(adj_p = round(p.adjust(p, method = "fdr", ), 3))

writexl::write_xlsx(p_values, "../outputs/table1_main_adjp_080222.xlsx")
```
